ValidationRule.description: Digital Audit URL on the Case Type 'Website Audit' must be populated to change the Status to Closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Case_Types__c,'Website Audit'), ISBLANK(Digital_Audit_URL__c), ISPICKVAL( Status ,'Closed') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Digital Audit URL must be populated before moving Status to Closed. If this case is no longer needed move the Status to 'Cancelled'.
